name: GetEnterpriseRetentionPolicies
description:
Retrieve all retention policies for an enterprise.

This tool retrieves all retention policies associated with an enterprise. Use it to get a comprehensive list of retention policies.

parameters.name: filter_by_policy_name_prefix
parameters.description: Filter results using a case-sensitive prefix for retention policy names.

value_schema.description:
Filters results by a case sensitive prefix of the name of
retention policies.

parameters.name: filter_by_retention_policy_type
parameters.description: Filter retention policies by type: 'finite' or 'indefinite'.

value_schema.description: Filters results by the type of retention policy.

parameters.name: filter_by_creator_user_id
parameters.description: Filters the retention policies by the ID of the user who created them. Provide the user ID for specific filtering.

value_schema.description: Filters results by the ID of the user who created policy.

parameters.name: include_fields
parameters.description: A list of attributes to include in the response, replacing standard fields unless specified.

value_schema.description:
A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the
response. This can be used to request fields that are
not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the
effect that none of the standard fields are returned in
the response unless explicitly specified, instead only
fields for the mini representation are returned, additional
to the fields requested.

parameters.name: maximum_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of retention policies to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: pagination_start_marker
parameters.description: Defines the position marker to begin returning results for marker-based pagination.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

retention policies.

value_schema.description:
Filters results by a case sensitive prefix of the name of

parameters.name: policy_type

value_schema.description: Filters results by the type of retention policy.

parameters.name: created_by_user_id
parameters.description: Filters results by the ID of the user who created policy.

value_schema.description: Filters results by the ID of the user who created policy.

not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the

value_schema.description:

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is

value_schema.description:
